text:
Hey <@U02CECUHNCD>, I’m not sure if we have these documented anywhere, but the internal values for the status fields are a little different than the display values. You could avoid this entirely by copying into a string property instead of an enumeration, but the internal values are
• Succeeded -> `SUCCESS`
• Failed, object removed from workflow -> `FAIL_IRREPARABLE`
• Failed, object continued to next action -> `FAIL_CONTINUE`
• Skipped, action deleted or outside execution dates -> `SKIPPED`
• Partially succeeded, some objects failed -> `PARTIAL_SUCCESS`

I am looking at getting a workflow triggered by an external event.  I am looking at having our CI/CD system trigger an email to people on our beta testers list with information about update.  But workflows all seem to start with a customer and I am looking at sending to a list.
